DOCNAME: CASE OF KURNAZ AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: No violation of Art.2;Violation of Art. 3
TEXT: CARDINAL . The application was initially introduced by PERSON who was born in DATE and was living in GPE . Following his death on DATE , his parents , brothers and sister ( hereinafter : “ the applicants ” ) expressed their intention to pursue the application on DATE . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE .
